document.full_text: the olympic gold-medal gymnast peter vidmar is stepping down as chief of mission for the 2012 united states olympic team after a controversy over his opposition to gay marriage.
document.title: sports briefing | olympics : vidmar leaves 2012 post over gay marriage stance
lines_and_colors: the olympic gold-medal gymnast peter vidmar is stepping down as chief of mission for the 2012 united states olympic team after a controversy over his opposition to gay marriage.
